description: This PHP source file manages the web interface for parental control managed services, including enabling/disabling services, displaying blocked services, trusted computers, and related user interactions.

methods.name: init_psmMode
methods.description: Initializes the page with a given title and navigation identifier.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Retrieves a configuration string value based on a given parameter.

methods.name: getInstanceIds
methods.description: Returns comma-separated string of instance IDs for a given parameter.

methods.name: getInstanceIDs
methods.description: Returns an array of instance IDs.
